value: <steps id="0" last="6"><step id="2" type="ActionStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><DIV><P>Open a new browser.</P></DIV></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P><BR/></P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="3" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><DIV><P>Navigate to <B>www.quicklearn.com</B></P></DIV></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>The QuickLearn home page is displayed.</P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="4" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Click the <B>Schedule</B> link in the main menu.</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>The calendar is displayed with all of the upcoming classes.</P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="5" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><DIV><P>Click the first <B>Register</B> button in the list.</P></DIV></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>The registration form is displayed.</P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="6" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>Next to Voucher/Promo Code, type <B>EARLY </B>and then click out of the text box.</P></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>The total price for the class is discounted by 10% and EARLY remains in the Voucher/Promo Code field.</P></parameterizedString><description/></step></steps>
